entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
